question: tropeni - Holds the address of another variable
rayar - Contiguous collection indexed by integers
fubfer - Temporary storage region for I/O or data
aprsre - Breaks source into tokens/structure (compiler component)
relink - Combines object files into an executable
ilevotal - Keyword that prevents certain compiler optimizations
tsac - Converts variable from one type to another
ticsat - Persists value across function calls (storage class)
